channel.title: [508] dead help me
channel.description: Can anyone post me a thing for player.java . im using codeusa,, Example: if you die at fight pits you respawn in waiting place... and dont lose items. and if you die anywhere but pvp you respawn in edgeville... and if u in PVP you lose stuff and spawn at edgebank to.. idk what happended what you lose all stuff anywhere u die.

item.title: [508] dead help me
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

The reason for if you die in fight pits and not lose your armour nor respawn in edge is because it is a minigame.
now for the last few error search for something like
“oh dear you have died”
or w.e. the dead message is, now either their will be a applydead(); or something along the lines of that…
search “void NAMEOFVOID” Example “void applydead”
look around in the void there should be something that checks for if the player is in a certain area s/he will lose their items. Change it around so you either do or do not lose anything…

Read full topic
